mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (ownerId, rotationId, sidoCodeId, storeName, address, tel, description, directionGuide, maxPeople, maxPeoplePerReserve, isBlocked, locationLatX, locationLonY) VALUES (#{ownerId}, #{rotationId}, #{sidoCodeId}, #{storeName}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{description}, #{directionGuide}, #{maxPeople}, #{maxPeoplePerReserve}, #{isBlocked}, #{locationLatX}, #{locationLonY})
